claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.
explanation: A flowchart determining influenza vaccination dosing for children in the 2022–23 season, based on whether the child received ≥2 doses of trivalent or quadrivalent influenza vaccine before July 1, 2022. If yes, the child gets 1 dose of 2022–23 influenza vaccine; if no or unknown, the child gets 2 doses of 2022–23 influenza vaccine ≥4 weeks apart. The figure is a dosing algorithm for pediatric influenza vaccination and does not address Flublok, antigenic match, or WHO/FDA strain selection, so it does not support the claim. Note: The image content is clear but unrelated to antigenic matching or Flublok; confidence is high in this determination.
